title: What's up with all the Yasuo?
body: I am a 1.5mill exp yasuo main and I'm loving it, but when they brought up the old Yasuo helmet bro video, I grew suspicious. Is this for a skin or something? First it was a new Yasuo figure, then they brought out the older Yasuo figma figure, then the shared lore, then the illustrated Yasuo Bio, now the old helmet bro yasuo video, and more lore tomorrow. Seems odd.
